attributes.action: Provide legal aid for claims of Promissory and Proprietary Estoppel
attributes.additional_details: The law is used as a shield so if a claim is made on a persons land, it is for the land owner (defender) to prove that the claim exists. However, if the defendant does not have sufficient funds to make a defence, then the claimant will automatically win the claim by default. Even if the defendant has a good defence to prove the claim is unfounded, without the relevant costly legal assistance, he loses his land. Legal aid needs to be given to stop the abuse of power it at present allows.
attributes.background: The law which governs promissory and proprietary estoppel is very old and is being used by wealthy business people to procure land from less affluent people. No legal aid is available.
